alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Toombs, southeastern Treutlen and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Kibbee, or near Soperton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Higgston, Tarrytown, Zaidee, Kibbee and Normantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
